targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "W" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'voltronic_load_watt') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(linear)

panels.description: Assumes 50% Discharge maximum on battery bank - To give approx. 3000 Cycles (8Years on bank)
panels.title: Battery Bank Voltage (V)

targets.query: SELECT sum("value")  / 60 * 2.20 FROM "W" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'shellyem_c7face_channel_2_power') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
